attr.name: Values
attr.content: [ left | center | right | top | bottom | <percentage> | <length> ] | [ left | center | right | <percentage> | <length> ] && [ top | center | bottom | <percentage> | <length> ] ] <length>?

attr.name: Percentages
attr.content: Refer to the size of the bounding box (see explanation)

attr.name: Computed value
attr.content: A percentage, except for length values, which are converted to an absolute length
